headline: Southern Style Beef Stew
name: Southern Style Beef Stew
description: This Southern-style beef stew is made with stew meat, such as arm-shoulder, okra, lima beans, and corn, plus two kinds of tomatoes—stewed and with chiles.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles
1 (10 ounce) package frozen baby lima beans

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add beef; quickly brown on all sides. Add stewed tomatoes, tomatoes with chiles, okra, lima beans, and corn; bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium.
Simmer 1 hour. Add potatoes; simmer until beef is very tender, about 30 minutes more.
